CustomField.description: Notify each task's assigned resource by this number of days before the task start date. Schedule the batch agent on the "Milestones PM+ Help" tab to enable this notification. The notifications are sent out per day at the batch agent's scheduled run time, exact timing dependent on this Salesforce instance's resource availability; the parent projects must also be in one of active statuses as defined in the "Active Statuses" setting. (Premium Edition Only)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Notify each task's assigned resource by this number of days before the task start date. Schedule the batch agent on the "Milestones PM+ Help" tab to enable this notification. The notifications are sent out per day at the batch agent's scheduled run time, exact timing dependent on this Salesforce instance's resource availability; the parent projects must also be in one of active statuses as defined in the "Active Statuses" setting. (Premium Edition Only)
CustomField.label: Days to Notify Before Task Start
